name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mobile View Tester: Responsive Web Design Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mobile-first design validation. Quickly preview and optimize website performance across multiple device screen sizes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform Your Web Design with Precision Mobile Device Testing
In today's mobile-first world, ensuring your website looks perfect across all devices is crucial. Mobile View Tester is the ultimate Chrome extension that empowers web developers, designers, and digital professionals to create flawless responsive websites with ease.

Why Mobile View Tester?

Comprehensive Mobile Device Simulation
Our powerful tool provides instant, accurate previews of your website across a wide range of mobile devices. From the latest smartphones to tablets, see exactly how your design performs in real-world conditions. No more guesswork or multiple device testing â€“ get comprehensive insights with a single click.
Key Features:

Instant Preview of 85+  Devices
Supports iPhone, Android, and Tablet ,Laptop Screens
Accurate Screen Resolution Simulation
One-Click Device View Switching
No Technical Setup Required

Designed for Professionals

Whether you're a web developer, UI/UX designer, freelancer, or part of a digital agency, Mobile View Tester streamlines your responsive design workflow. Catch layout issues before they reach your users, ensuring a seamless mobile experience.

How It Works:

Install the Chrome Extension
Open Your Website
Select From 85+ Device Profiles
Instantly Validate Your Design

Performance Optimization

Lightweight and Fast
Minimal Browser Resource Usage
No External Software Needed
Works Directly in Chrome

Privacy and Security

100% Browser-Based
No Data Collection
Secure Testing Environment

Perfect For:

Web Developers
UI/UX Designers
Digital Agencies
Freelance Professionals
Quality Assurance Teams
